name: Allergic
description:
This was made for Paint Jam 2021 in two days! The premise is that your friend has asked you to house sit while they are away on vacation, but you are allergic to their cat.

All assets were drawn in MS Paint with a computer mouse. I took on the extra  challenge of drawing all the outlines of things with a blindfold on, then I colored in to the best of my ability with the pencil tool. I made all of the sound effects using my mouth (a few times having to hold keys in my mouth...).
